languages.text: "Годы игры, обмана и ухищрений, убеждения самой себя, что я достойна большего, чем смерть на грязной улице — и все это он выпотрошил и вывернул наизнанку за пару часов. А кто я без нее в глазах всех? Вновь отребье, имеющее право лишь на объедки. Моей золотой шкурке конец, а без нее жизнь... все такое же говно, какой я ее помню".

"Years of games, deceit, and subterfuge, of telling myself that I do deserve more than a squalid death in the gutter — and he went and disembowelled it and turned everything inside out in a couple of hours. Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."
languages.original_text: "Годы игры, обмана и ухищрений, убеждения самой себя, что я достойна большего, чем смерть на грязной улице — и все это он выпотрошил и вывернул наизнанку за пару часов. А кто я без нее в глазах всех? Вновь отребье, имеющее право лишь на объедки. Моей золотой шкурке конец, а без нее жизнь... все такое же говно, какой я ее помню".

Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

languages.text: “这么多年的游戏、欺骗与诡计，我这么努力地告诉自己，说我不该死在臭水沟里。可他仅仅用了几个小时，就把我的人生开膛破肚，把所有的一切都翻了个底朝天。如果我失去了我原本的人生，那我又是谁？我在别人眼里是什么样子？我又变回了原来的人渣，只配苟延残喘。我已经的金面具已经不见了。没有了它，人生……就是一坨屎，和以前一样。”
languages.original_text: "Years of games, deceit, and subterfuge, of telling myself that I do deserve more than a squalid death in the gutter — and he went and disembowelled it and turned everything inside out in a couple of hours. Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

traits.locale_text: “这么多年的游戏、欺骗与诡计，我这么努力地告诉自己，说我不该死在臭水沟里。可他仅仅用了几个小时，就把我的人生开膛破肚，把所有的一切都翻了个底朝天。如果我失去了我原本的人生，那我又是谁？我在别人眼里是什么样子？我又变回了原来的人渣，只配苟延残喘。我已经的金面具已经不见了。没有了它，人生……就是一坨屎，和以前一样。”

languages.text: 「何年にもわたる駆け引き、欺瞞、策略。そんな中で、アタシは側溝で惨めに死ぬ以上の価値があると自分自身に言い聞かせてきたんだ…そして彼は、それを2～3時間でバラバラにしてひっくり返してしまった。その人生なくして、アタシは何者だっていうんだ？みんなにはどう見える？クズに戻り、ゴミを漁る権利しかない何者かだ。黄金の仮面がなければ、人生は…以前のようなクソなものなんだ」
languages.original_text: "Years of games, deceit, and subterfuge, of telling myself that I do deserve more than a squalid death in the gutter — and he went and disembowelled it and turned everything inside out in a couple of hours. Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

traits.locale_text: 「何年にもわたる駆け引き、欺瞞、策略。そんな中で、アタシは側溝で惨めに死ぬ以上の価値があると自分自身に言い聞かせてきたんだ…そして彼は、それを2～3時間でバラバラにしてひっくり返してしまった。その人生なくして、アタシは何者だっていうんだ？みんなにはどう見える？クズに戻り、ゴミを漁る権利しかない何者かだ。黄金の仮面がなければ、人生は…以前のようなクソなものなんだ」

languages.text: «Años de juegos, engaños y subterfugios, convenciéndome a mí misma que merecía algo más que morir tirada en la calle como un perro sarnoso; y llega él y me destripa el plan y lo pone todo del revés en cuestión de horas. Sin esa vida, ¿quién soy? ¿Qué ve en mí la gente? Otra vez escoria, relegada a las sobras. He perdido mi máscara dorada, y sin ella, la vida... es la misma mierda de siempre».
languages.original_text: "Years of games, deceit, and subterfuge, of telling myself that I do deserve more than a squalid death in the gutter — and he went and disembowelled it and turned everything inside out in a couple of hours. Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

traits.locale_text: «Años de juegos, engaños y subterfugios, convenciéndome a mí misma que merecía algo más que morir tirada en la calle como un perro sarnoso; y llega él y me destripa el plan y lo pone todo del revés en cuestión de horas. Sin esa vida, ¿quién soy? ¿Qué ve en mí la gente? Otra vez escoria, relegada a las sobras. He perdido mi máscara dorada, y sin ella, la vida... es la misma mierda de siempre».

languages.text: « Après des années de jeux, de tromperie et de subterfuge, passées à me dire que je méritais mieux qu'une mort sordide dans un caniveau, il vient tout éviscérer et mettre sens dessus dessous en quelques heures à peine. Sans cette vie, qui je suis ? De quoi j'ai l'air aux yeux des autres ? Je suis plus qu'une vermine qui doit se battre pour grappiller des miettes. J'ai perdu mon masque doré et sans lui, la vie... redevient aussi merdique qu'elle l'était avant. »
languages.original_text: "Years of games, deceit, and subterfuge, of telling myself that I do deserve more than a squalid death in the gutter — and he went and disembowelled it and turned everything inside out in a couple of hours. Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

traits.locale_text: « Après des années de jeux, de tromperie et de subterfuge, passées à me dire que je méritais mieux qu'une mort sordide dans un caniveau, il vient tout éviscérer et mettre sens dessus dessous en quelques heures à peine. Sans cette vie, qui je suis ? De quoi j'ai l'air aux yeux des autres ? Je suis plus qu'une vermine qui doit se battre pour grappiller des miettes. J'ai perdu mon masque doré et sans lui, la vie... redevient aussi merdique qu'elle l'était avant. »

languages.text: "So viele Jahre der Spiele, der Täuschungen und der List – und während der ganzen Zeit redete ich mir ein, dass ich mehr verdiene, als verwahrlost in irgendeiner Gosse zu verrecken. Und dann kam er, nahm es aus und in ein paar Stunden war meine ganze Welt auf den Kopf gestellt. Wer bin ich ohne dieses Leben? Wofür halten mich die Leute? Ich bin wieder der Abschaum, dem nichts zusteht, außer irgendwelche Reste. Ich habe meine goldene Maske verloren und ohne sie fühlt sich mein Leben ... genauso dreckig an wie früher."
languages.original_text: "Years of games, deceit, and subterfuge, of telling myself that I do deserve more than a squalid death in the gutter — and he went and disembowelled it and turned everything inside out in a couple of hours. Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."

Und dann kam er, nahm es aus und in ein paar Stunden war meine ganze Welt auf den Kopf gestellt. Wer bin ich ohne dieses Leben? Wofür halten mich die Leute? Ich bin wieder der Abschaum, dem nichts zusteht, außer irgendwelche Reste. Ich habe meine goldene Maske verloren und ohne sie fühlt sich mein Leben ... genauso dreckig an wie früher."

languages.text: "Yıllar boyunca süren oyunlar, aldatmacalar, dalavereler, lağımda pislik içinde ölmekten daha fazlasını hak ettiğimi kendi kendime tekrar tekrar söylemeler... Ama sonra o gidiyor, bütün bunların karnını deşiyor ve birkaç saat içinde her şeyin içini dışına çıkarıyor. O yaşam olmasa ben kimim ki? İnsanlar beni nasıl görür? Yine hurdalara mahkûm bir pislik hâline gelirim. Altın maskemi kaybettim ve o olmadan, yaşam... Yine o boktan hâline döndü.
languages.original_text: "Years of games, deceit, and subterfuge, of telling myself that I do deserve more than a squalid death in the gutter — and he went and disembowelled it and turned everything inside out in a couple of hours. Without that life, who am I? What do I look like to people? Back to being scum, only entitled to scraps. I've lost my golden mask, and without it, life... is the same old shit as before."
